title: Loans and extensions of credit to executive
context: ยง412:6-304 Loans and extensions of credit to executive officers, directors, principal shareholders and affiliates. No savings bank shall make any loan or extension of credit in violation of section 18(j) of the Federal Deposit Insurance Act, 12 U.S.C. ยง1828(j). [L 1993, c 350, pt of ยง1]
